Our team uses the PXN 0082 fight stick for the operator’s controls. The buttons aren’t labeled on it so I modified the manual’s diagram to make a reference image labeling the buttons by number and also the ones you shouldn’t touch (macro, turbo, home). \u003ca href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iotvCOFX11zMMg4hFC6K2nuLGX4-e-V1/view?usp=sharing\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003ePNG version \u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cCZDOyy5U-I-W1Ux1tcqXLGZ1lHIIYuM/view?usp=sharing\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eSVG version \u003c/a\u003e. Hope this is helpful for other teams!
